resources.string:
Different treasures are hidden around you: scan your surroundings with your device and find them by following the different Xs. To bring one to light, get closer and click when the X becomes red, or double-click if the object seems to be behind an obstacle or somewhere inaccessible.
 Careful: you have limited time (which you can choose), but you get 5 more seconds for every object you find.

Good luck!
Choose your difficulty by selecting the number of objects to find and the time that you will have to explore
!! Congrats !!\n\nYou have found all the hidden objects
!! Too bad !!\n\nYou didn\'t find all the objects in the allotted time
